name: Feng Li 0014
content: Feng's Homepage Home Publications Teaching Projects Services Awards Contact Welcome to Feng's Homepage I received my PhD degree in Computer Science from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore, in 2015, under the supervision of Prof Jun Luo and Prof Ying He. I obtained my BS and MS degrees from Shandong Normal University, China, in 2007 and Shandong University, China, in 2010, respectively. From 2014 to 2015, I was a research fellow in School of Computing, National University of Singapore, Singapore, working with Prof Seth Gilbert and Prof Mun Choon Chan. I then joined Shandong University, China, where I am currently a professor. I received IEEE IPCCC 2020 Best Paper Award and IEEE/ACM IWQoS 2025 Best Paper Runner-Up. I also received 2020 ACM China SIGAPP Rising Star Award due to the contribution in sensor networks, Internet of Things and their applications. My current research interests include distributed algorithms/systems, machine learning, wireless networking, mobile computing, edge computing and Internet of Things. I am looking for highly motivated Postdocs, Master/PhD students with strong background in CS, EE and Math. Undergraduate students who are interested in my research are also welcome to join us as research assistant.Feel free to join us if your are interested.
